name: SUPERVERSE
description:
SUPERVERSE is fast-paced arcade space shooter game taking player to exploration of ancient network of unique “pocket” universes interconnected by wormhole super-highways in a search of a way to return to past and prevent destruction of his home world.
Player can only count on his own instinct, reflexes, speed, weapon destructive power and the shield to protect himself while taking care of enemy spaceships, asteroids, explosions and particles around him.FeaturesExplore unique and interconnected universes
Travel through wormholes & discover new worlds
Be the artificial intelligence & fight against top-notch AI driven machines
Choose from a range of high-tech spaceships
Newtonian & other physics powered universes
Shoot destructive weapons; a multitude of options for making things explode
Enjoy an impressive 3D visual experience
Engaging music and full 3D sound effects
Play in Co-Op local multiplayer or Single player mode
